title: How to write a paragraph about moral education - Quora

response.answer_text: Moral educationThe terms seems fading in 21st century in our country like India ,even though once it was known for its moral base for natural,just  and healthy living .earlier even parents used to educate their children morally when they were at the apt age . But now because of commercialisation of education and over occupied parents the children of our country are suffering and hence there is a lack of moral education . The solution to this can be aware teenagers can educate themselves through holy books (india is fortunate to have a moral rich culture)And also spend time with their grand parents .
